summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of sold albums in thousand copies, with a total of 5 data points.
Overall Number of sold albums in thousand copies has increased over the Year
Number of sold albums in thousand copies is rapidly increasing from 2013 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.

Min Number of sold albums in thousand copies about 58.0 was recorded at Year 2013
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of sold albums in thousand copies with a total of 5 data points. The chart has one significant trend.
This trend is increasing which exists from 2017 to 2013.
